title: Nobilis Health Corp. Names Phil Ayres Chief Marketing Officer
text:
HOUSTON, May 22, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- Nobilis Health Corp. (NYSE American: HLTH) (NEO: HLTH) ("Nobilis" or the "Company") announced today that it has promoted Phil Ayres, Nobilis' Vice President of Marketing, to Chief Marketing Officer, effective today.
"Phil has done a wonderful job optimizing our marketing efforts since he joined our team last June," said Kenneth Efird, President. "In the first quarter, Phil's team oversaw a year-over-year 28% reduction in total marketing expenses, driven by lower customer acquisition costs and increased patient conversion in 2018. Phil has executed on all of the initiatives he has overseen during his tenure as Vice President of Marketing at Nobilis. As Chief Marketing Officer, Phil will continue building out our marketing team and the platform's capabilities, making Nobilis more effective and increasing our impact in new and existing markets."
"I am excited to take on this role as we continue to expand our highly scalable approach to direct to consumer healthcare marketing," Ayres said. "Our investment in building an unparalleled direct to consumer healthcare web platform reflects the substantial role of digital marketing in Nobilis' growth. My background with digital marketing giants Travelocity and Hotels.com taught me how to execute digital marketing strategies at scale, and I look forward to continuing to bring those strategies to Nobilis Health in the Chief Marketing Officer role."
About Nobilis Health Corp.
Nobilis Health ( www.NobilisHealth.com ) is a full-service healthcare development and management company, with more than 30 locations across Texas and Arizona, including hospitals, ambulatory surgery centers, and multi-specialty clinics. In addition, Nobilis Health partners with more than 30 facilities across the country. Marketing nine independent brands, Nobilis Health deploys a unique patient acquisition strategy driven by proprietary, direct-to-consumer marketing technology, focusing on a specified set of procedures that are performed at its facilities by local physicians. Nobilis Health's business model connects patients with physicians and delivers the highest quality healthcare.
